channel.title: Crappy days
channel.description:
Have you ever had one of those days where you feel like god has just disowned you for that one particular day?
This is what happened to me within the past 24 hours. . .
My Great Grandmother passed away from a heart attack. (going to funeral) Then my Great Grandfather died (other side of my family) of old age (96) (died last night) I wake this morning to find out that i have to go to a funeral for my friends Grandpa who died in a car accident (idk when). And the final thing that happened about 15 minutes ago was my Itouch 4th gen broke . . .
Shitty day?

item.title: Crappy days
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

Well I just came back from a funeral, the person died last Wednesday, the viewing was yesterday, so it took about a week for it all to take place…
But anyways… You all should stop freaking out on each other for the most stupidest reasons.

Read full topic

item.title: Crappy days
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Death

Read full topic

item.title: Crappy days
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“Miles`, post:18, topic:377423”]I’m sorry, but I’ve never heard of a funeral being held 1-2 weeks after someone has passed…

If someone dies Monday their viewing is usually Wednesday and funeral is Thursday… Atleast all the funeral/viewing’s that I have been to or ever heard about have been that way.

1-2 weeks is a bit of a leep.[/quote]

for god sakes don’t be a jack-ass about this please. I know the words that are coming out of my mouth, do i know why? No. I remember when my aunt passed it was like this because she had diabetes and when she went to bed one night she didn’t wake up. It might be the autopsy, but idk. . .

Read full topic

item.title: Crappy days
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

[quote=“Miles`, post:18, topic:377423”]I’m sorry, but I’ve never heard of a funeral being held 1-2 weeks after someone has passed…

If someone dies Monday their viewing is usually Wednesday and funeral is Thursday… Atleast all the funeral/viewing’s that I have been to or ever heard about have been that way.

1-2 weeks is a bit of a leep.[/quote]
Don’t be a idiot, funerals can be held two weeks later. if tests need to be taked it can take weeks!

Read full topic

I’m sorry, but I’ve never heard of a funeral being held 1-2 weeks after someone has passed…

If someone dies Monday their viewing is usually Wednesday and funeral is Thursday… Atleast all the funeral/viewing’s that I have been to or ever heard about have been that way.

[quote=“Phaze One, post:15, topic:377423”]Yeah when my relatives die my immediate reaction is to tell Moparscape and not spend time with broken family members

Sorry for loss etc[/quote]

item.title: Crappy days
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“R A R E S, post:4, topic:377423”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=473317.msg3461256#msg3461256 date=1294503033]

Have you ever had one of those days where you feel like god has just disowned you for that one particular day?

This is what happened to me within the past 24 hours. . .

My Great Grandmother passed away from a heart attack.
Then my Great Grandfather died (other side of my family) of old age (96)
I wake this morning to find out that i have to go to a funeral for my friends Grandpa who died in a car accident (idk when).
And the final thing that happened about 15 minutes ago was my Itouch 4th gen broke . . .

Shitty day?

I think your bullshitting. 2 deaths and a funeral in 1 day? No ones luck is that bad.
[/quote]

You realize that you go to the funeral a week or two after they die right? I’m going to there funerals today

BTW peoples whole families die in one day and i’m pretty sure that is worse. Stop trying to act like you know everything because death is a daily thing not luck. . .[/quote]

Obviously death is a daily thing, but not daily to 1 person…

Read full topic

item.title: Crappy days
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

I haven’t had a bad for a while… But my worst had to be when my grand father died back in 04. The sad part is that Ive pushed it so far out that I can’t remember the day, the funeral, or even the day my parents told me he died.

Read full topic

item.title: Crappy days
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Wow, and I get sad when I can’t get on MoparScape for a day…

Sorry to hear about your losses mate.

Read full topic

item.title: Crappy days
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

And then you found out God doesn’t exist?! WORST DAY EVAR!!!

But, yeah I’m sorry to hear about that, hope tomorrow is better.

Read full topic

item.title: Crappy days
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“R A R E S, post:9, topic:377423”][quote author=Spades link=topic=473317.msg3461515#msg3461515 date=1294519788]
How do you compare deaths to an iPhone?
[/quote]

There is no comparing? Its me telling you how my day is sucking dick.[/quote]

Thank you. I wasn’t comparing, I was telling you what ruined my day.

Read full topic
